description: Students examine Anton Chekhov's legacy by reading his work in translation and exploring his
impact on the genre of the short story through the study of his literary descendants. Authors to be
considered include James Joyce, Ernest Hemingway, Grace Paley, and Ray Carver. Students
explore these authors through reading, discussion, and a variety of written assignments.
Prerequisite: FYW or equivalent. Offered occasionally.
fullname: Chekhov's Legacy: A Study of the Short Story
